h2_title: Where to Find the Gore-Eye Daoist
h3_title: Gore-Eye Daoist Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: Up close, the Gore-Eye Daoist can only employ a few staff swings that don’t hit hard, and will regularly rely on his blood spells to keep you at bay.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gore-Eye_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Gore-Eye Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Gore-Eye Daoist' and the sub-subsection 'Gore-Eye Daoist Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Up close, the Gore-Eye Daoist can only employ a few staff swings that don’t hit hard, and will regularly rely on his blood spells to keep you at bay.
